bio: Smol: simple, elegant and functional blockchain dapps for common crypto tasks.
contributionDescription:
Smol has seven live dapps that help users perform common crypto tasks in a more safe, seamless and simple fashion. Our latest launch, MultiSafe letâ€™s users deploy a Safe with the same address on most chains including Optimism.

This grant would help retroactively fund our team for the six dapps now live on Optimism while also bringing dump.services to Optimism and developing new apps for the OP ecosystem. 

Recent Smol highlights include MultiSafe being featured in Blockworks and our token dumping dapp (Dump.services) surpasing $4.2M in volume within the first 4 months.
impactDescription:
We currently have 7 live dapps, 6 of which are currently live on Optimism - designed to help OP users do common crypto tasks in an easier, more seamless way. 

Disperse app - to disperse erc20 tokens 

erc20 migrator - simple migrator for erc20 tokens

nft migrator - same as erc20 but for nfts 

tokenlistooor - automated and uptodate token list fork of uniswap tokenlist 

gib.to - create a simple donation page in seconds 

dump.service - swap multiple erc20 to one (currently only working on chains supporting cowswap since it uses it for sandwich and front run protection) 

Multisafe - gives people a simple way to have one Safe address on different chains.
pwCategorySuggestions: Smart Contract Platforms, Cross-Chain Platforms, Tokenization Platforms, Blockchain Infrastructure, Digital Identity
